name: plaguey
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
like or affected by the plague (= a serious disease that kills many people): I was confronted by a gang of plaguey youths. I will be so happy when I am finally able to get away from this plaguey spot. I hope that something worthwhile might come out of this plaguy mess.
More examplesFewer examplesI hope that the doctor will be able to give me something to stop this plaguey itching.He never returned to England, but died of some plaguey fever on the journey home.
